Summary: Target cluster namespaces now visible for cross-cluster live migration
column5: projects were fetched from the host cluster instead of the target cluster. As a consequence
column6: target cluster namespaces were not visible in the UI
column7: causing user inconvenience. With this release
column8: cross-cluster live migration fetches project data from the target cluster
column9: making target cluster namespaces visible in the UI during migration.

Summary: VDDK image archive upload succeeds in private namespaces
column4: VMware Virtual Disk Development Kit (VDDK) image archive upload failure occurred in private namespaces due to incorrect namespace usage. As a consequence
column5: users experienced VDDK image upload failure in private namespaces during source provider creation. With this release
column6: you can upload VDDK tar archives successfully in private namespaces.

Summary: Correct UI display of migration type after change
column4: if you changed the Migration type on the Plan details page in the MTV UI from warm to cold
column5: the YAML file was updated correctly but the UI did not display the updated migration type. With this release
column6: the UI edit field for Migration type updates the migration type in the YAML file and the UI correctly displays the updated migration type.
